List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Core object accessible via the debugging console.

This class provides acces to the GameEngine via the debugging console.

Member Data Documentation

tAttrbList RainbruRPG::Exception::ConsoleObject::attrbList [protected, inherited]

The list of the Object's attributes.

A console object can have some typed attributes. They are stored in a stl vector of ObjectAttribute.
